original_title: 夫には言えない羞恥の性癖 西野翔
overview: As a lawyer, I met my husband at work and got married. Now I am supporting my husband who is busy flying around. At that time, the factory run by his brother-in-law, Yuzo, was forced into bankruptcy, and his husband, who was worried about his single Yuzo, called him to Tokyo and lived with us.
title: Embarrassing Fetish I Can't Tell My Husband About... Sho Nishino
